content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, you are a student, right? So, I can offer you the apartment for 700 Euros per month. It's a great location and the area is safe. I am sure you will like it.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 700 Euros is too low for me. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, how about 750 Euros per month? This is the lowest I can go. I have to cover the costs of the building and the maintenance of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 750 Euros is still too low. I want a price that reflects the value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 800 Euros per month? I think this is a fair price for both of us.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 800 Euros is a better offer, but I am hoping for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, but 800 Euros is the best I can offer. The apartment is in a great location and is newly built. I think it's a good deal for you.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but I am hoping for a price that reflects the true value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I have already offered the lowest price I can offer. The apartment is already at a very reasonable price for its location and facilities.
name: Haoyu Wang from China
